text: The Udjiji worm lizard (Loveridgea phylofiniens) is a worm lizard species in the family Amphisbaenidae. It is found in Tanzania. ==References== Category:Loveridgea Category:Endemic fauna of Tanzania Category:Reptiles of Tanzania Category:Reptiles described in 1899 Category:Taxa named by Gustav Tornier
title: Udjiji worm lizard
